content.notes: Content not refactored in Phase 1; original preserved under payload.

layout_template.notes: Layout based on the Africa_ADayInTheLife.jpg draft (layout only). Character content sourced from new_prompts.xlsx (Option B) and scene image links/prompts from the continent .docx.

header.notes: Handwritten/script title at top-left over a muted world-map background.

grid.notes: Each character row = left info panel + 6 image cards. Each card has a square photo above a short caption.

characters.name: Lars

label.headline: Lars
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Lars is a 50-year-old fisherman living in the Lofoten Islands of Norway. Norwegian culture emphasizes a strong connection to nature, evident in everyday tasks like cod fishing.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I tighten my coat and breathe in sharp sea air. Fresh snow dusts my boots while I ready the boat.

image.alt_text: Lars (Fisherman) in Norway: Lofoten harbor pre‚Äëdawn winter.

image_description.from_mj_prompt: Scene 1: Lofoten harbor pre‚Äëdawn winter; middle‚Äëaged Norwegian fisherman preparing lines and nets on a small cod boat; medium framing; eye‚Äëline toward distant harbor lights with calm resolve; clear cultural anchors: thick wool sweater under yellow raincoat, rubber boots, coil of cod nets, Norwegian registration markings on hull; environmental cues: polar night blue hour, snow flurries, steep snowy mountains; motion cues: lantern flicker, breath cloud, slow snow drift; Camera: Nikon Z8, 35‚ÄØmm f/1.8, ISO 1600, 1/125‚ÄØs; lighting: pre‚Äëdawn dock lamps + cold ambient; RAW photo, filename: DSC_8602.NEF; with improved facial accuracy --sref
keywords: middle‚Äëaged Norwegian fisherman preparing lines and nets on a small cod boat
eye‚Äëline toward distant harbor lights with calm resolve

scenes.caption_first_person: I guide the boat under shifting green light. Waves whisper and the sky feels alive just for me.

image.alt_text: Lars (Fisherman) in Norway: Open Barents waters.

scenes.caption_first_person: The winch groans and cod spill onto deck. Their scales shine and I whisper a thank you to the sea.

image.alt_text: Lars (Fisherman) in Norway: Winter daylight glow offshore.

scenes.caption_first_person: My son and I share hot stew. Every spoonful tastes better because we cooked it together out here.

scenes.caption_first_person: I spot the harbor lamps. My arms ache but my heart lifts because home is close.

scenes.caption_first_person: I sink into a chair by the crackling fire. My family leans close and home feels complete.

image.alt_text: Lars (Fisherman) in Norway: Nordic wooden living room.

characters.name: Elena

label.headline: Elena
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Elena is an 18-year-old artisan from the Maramure»ô region of Romania. Romanian rural culture, especially in Maramure»ô, is rich in traditional crafts, folklore, wood carving, and embroidery.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: I weave bright yarn. Grandmother‚Äôs smile warms me more than the sun on the cottage window.

image.alt_text: Elena (Artisan) in Romania: Maramure»ô cottage interior.

keywords: young Romanian artisan weaving at a small loom by the window

scenes.caption_first_person: I sit on the porch and draw fresh designs. Stars guide my pencil and new ideas bloom.

characters.name: Nikos

label.headline: Nikos
label.notes: Left-side info panel: small flag icon above the character name; subhead directly below.

characters.bio_short: Nikos is a 10-year-old boy living on a remote Greek island, such as Ikaria, known for its relaxed lifestyle and longevity of its inhabitants. Greek island culture emphasizes a close-knit community, strong family bonds, traditional festivals (such as the Feast of Panagia), Mediterranean diet, and a leisurely pace of life.

scenes.sequence_notes: Scene 1 starts the day; scenes progress in chronological order.
scenes.caption_first_person: Waves glitter outside the window. I jot notes about dolphins and feel the salt breeze even indoors.

image.alt_text: Nikos (Island Student) in Greece: Whitewashed island classroom.

scenes.caption_first_person: I dive deep then burst up laughing. Sea foam tastes like summer freedom on my lips.

scenes.caption_first_person: I carry plates of grilled octopus. The scent mixes with sea air and makes me hungry too.

scenes.caption_first_person: The bouzouki rings. I spin and stomp with everyone and the island feels like one big heartbeat.

scenes.caption_first_person: We lean against warm tiles. Grandpa points out constellations and I promise to remember every story.
